resetTricksRoutine.note: Set each player's tricks won to 0, and bid icons to X

loopRoutine.comment: Default variable name is the name of the property, so we use that in LABEL below

info.name: Vineyard
info.attribution:
Game layout and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.

All card icons are from https://game-icons.net and are used under CC BY 3.0.

Library image and game background are from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik license: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/abstract-landscape-background-illustration_16340936.htm
info.description: Harvest your vines carefully, and disrupt opponents by tossing them duplicate ingredients.
info.helpText: Note that you must manually deal out cards to players based on the round number. Just click on the "Shuffle and Deal" button to do this!

clickRoutine.header: Add this many points to your score:

clickRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 1 of 2: only add value if it is an integer

thenRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 2 of 2: only add value if it is a three-digit number

label-guide.text:
Players:		2p-3p		4p			5p
R1 deal:		1 card		1 card		1 card
R2 deal:		2 cards		2 cards		2 cards
R3 deal:		3 cards		3 cards		3 cards
R4 deal:		4 cards		4 cards		4 cards
R5 deal:		5 cards		5 cards		4 cards
R6 deal:		6 cards		5 cards		4 cards
